com.fxgraph.graph

Class Model

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fxgraph.graph.Model
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Model
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Owns all cells and edges that can be displayed on a graph.
    Author:
    sirolf2009, ogallagher (javadoc)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private javafx.collections.ObservableList<ICell> addedCells
      Temporary references to newly added cells, which are cleared on merge().
      private javafx.collections.ObservableList<IEdge> addedEdges
      Temporary references to newly added edges, which are cleared on merge().
      private javafx.collections.ObservableList<ICell> allCells
      References to all cells in the model.
      private javafx.collections.ObservableList<IEdge> allEdges
      References to all edges in the model.
      private javafx.collections.ObservableList<ICell> removedCells
      Temporary references to newly removed cells, which are cleared on merge().
      private javafx.collections.ObservableList<IEdge> removedEdges
      Temporary references to newly removed edges, which are cleared on merge().
      private ICell root
      Cells are hierarchical, with a single root cell that has no parent cell.
      private static long serialVersionUID

      Redundant and unused way to clear lists of newly added graphic nodes.
      void disconnectFromGraphParent(java.util.List<ICell> cellList)
      Remove cell children from the root cell.
      void endUpdate()
      Assuming the caller already added and removed the proper graph nodes from the canvas, this ensures all added cells have a parent, and all removed cells do not.

      javafx.collections.ObservableList<IEdge> getRemovedEdges() 
      ICell getRoot() 
      void merge()
      Add newly added cells and edges to the model, remove newly removed cells and edges from the model, and clear the corresponding temporary reference lists.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Model

        public Model()
        Model constructor. Creates the empty root cell and calls clear().

    • Method Detail

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Set all graphic node references to empty observable lists.

      • clearAddedLists

        public void clearAddedLists()
        Deprecated. Redundant and unused way to clear lists of newly added graphic nodes.

      • endUpdate

        public void endUpdate()
        Assuming the caller already added and removed the proper graph nodes from the canvas, this ensures all added cells have a parent, and all removed cells do not. Then, merge() is called.
